title: Scribus 1.6 Open-Source Desktop Publishing App Released as a Major Update
description:
Scribus 1.6 free, open-source, cross-platform, and powerful desktop publishing software is now available for download.

The post Scribus 1.6 Open-Source Desktop Publishing App Released as a Major Update appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
